item.title: 704 Need help i want to make it all can use item
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Ok go to commands.java and search for this -

public static boolean processNormalCommand(Player player, String[] cmd,
			boolean console, boolean clientCommand) {

Under should be where all your ::home commands are etc. Move the ::item command from its original position to somewhere under that above.

Then change the command from - if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item") && (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("slatsick"))) {

To…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item")) {

Also delete the if (cmd.length < 2){ if (player.getRights() <= 2)

Hope it helps.
